name: WP Sendy Newsletter Generator
author: Brent Wilson

sections.description:
WP Sendy Newsletter Generator is a simple no frills plugin that creates a simple and clean newsletter template that is mobile friendly and automatically compatible with Sendy.co.

Not familiar with Sendy.co? Check out What Is Sendy.co
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the Sendy Newsletter options screen to configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
What Is Sendy.co?

Check out What Is Sendy.co
sections.changelog:

  • Added screenshots of the plugin

1.0.0

  • First stable release
